attributes.action: Allow hospitality sector to reopen in all 3 tier levels
attributes.additional_details: Any venue that operates following the guidelines, hygiene and safety measures is just as safe as non-essential shops with the added value of keeping records for track and trace that would help us tackle COVID spread.
attributes.background: Allow restaurants and pubs in all tier groups to operate with all safety measures in place and all appropriate restrictions.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325069
